==============
filter_caption
==============

.. js:attribute:: filter_caption

**domain**: client 

**language**: javascript

**class** :doc:`Filter class </refs/client/filter_api>`


Description
===========

**Filter_caption** attribute specifies the name of the filter that appears to 
users.

See also
========

:doc:`Filters </programming/data/filters>`

:doc:`filter_name <at_filter_name>`

:doc:`Dataset </programming/data/dataset>`
